headline: Ecolab Life Sciences Launches New Bioprocessing Purification Resin to Drive Manufacturing Productivity
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., June 16, 2025--Ecolab Life Sciences announces the launch of its Purolite™ AP+50 affinity chromatography resin designed to drive manufacturing productivity.
